column1: #Text=Katara says : " I 'm sorry about what I said earlier .
#Text=It 's funny , the way you were talking back in the store ?
#Text=" Haru says : " My father was very courageous .
#Text=When the Fire Nation invaded , he and the other earthbenders were outnumbered ten to one .
#Text=" Katara says : " He sounds like a great man .
#Text=" Haru says : " After the attack , they rounded up my father and every other earthbender , and took them away .
#Text=" Katara says : " So that 's why you hide your earthbending .
#Text=Problem is ... the only way I can feel close to my father now is when I practice my bending .
#Text=" Katara says : " I lost my mother in a Fire Nation raid .
#Text=This necklace is all I have left of her .
#Text=" Haru says : " It 's not enough , is it ?
